OpenSMOG¶

OpenSMOG.OpenSMOG¶

The OpenSmog classes perform Molecular dynamics using Structure-based Models for Biomolecules.

class OpenSMOG.OpenSMOG.OpenSMOG(name='SBM', dt=0.002, gamma=1.0, rcutoff=1.5, temperature=1)[source]¶

Bases: object

The OpenSmog sets the environment to start the OpenSMOG class.

Args:

saveFolder(folder)[source]¶

Sets the folder path to save data.

Parameters

folder (str, optional) – Folder path to save the simulation data. If the folder path does not exist, the function will create the directory.
